txt.en: Spiders can be found to the east of Sardol and inside the cave of Lhingroth.\n\nYou have discovered the spiders of Lhingroth, who pose a serious threat to the people of Sardol.
You have defeated many of the spiders of Lhingroth. While there are surely more beneath Tarlang's Peaks, they should no longer be able to harass the people of Sardol so freely.
You have slain many spiders and defeated the brood-mother in Lhingroth.
After seeing what the spiders of Lhingroth are capable of, you decide to cull their numbers for the good of the people of Sardol.

You have discovered the spiders of Lhingroth to be as violent as suggested by the people of Sardol.\n\nYou should cull their numbers and slay their brood-mother to aid in the defence of the Gondorians of Sardol.
